directions: Spread 1 tablespoon cream cheese over entire surface of each tortilla. Dot middle of each tortilla with 1/4 teaspoon mustard. Top with 2 slices ham, 1 Tablespoon cheese, and 1/4 of the slivered apple. Roll tortillas tightly into a wrap. Wrap tightly in plastic wrap and refrigerate.
To serve: Remove from plastic wrap and cut in half.
ingredients: 1 small apple, sliced into toothpick-sized slivers
title: Sweet Ham Roll-Ups
